title: Publish edge_embedded_browser/client/win/webview2.idl
body:
Please publish the file edge_embedded_browser/client/win/webview2.idl or a corresponding type library.
I intend to use the WebView2 control from another language that C++. For this I can use an idl file or a type library, but not a C++ header file.

comments.body: Hey Thomas. We published the IDL files in our latest SDK update - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/hosting/webview2/releasenotes#08190. Thanks for sharing the issue with us.
Thank you @Thomas. I've opened this as an issue on the feedback repo for WebView2 - https://github.com/MicrosoftEdge/WebViewFeedback/issues/14 - feel free to comment and track there.
Good point, thanks! We'll fix this.
